member.name: AM_COPY_MACROVISION
member.summary: The AM_COPY_MACROVISION structure specifies the analog copy protection level for an NTSC encoder.

member.name: AM_COPY_MACROVISION.MACROVISIONLevel
member.summary: Analog copy protection level for the NTSC encoder. Member of the AM_COPY_MACROVISION_LEVEL enumerated data type.
